CAREER SUMMARY  
 
Aug 2020 to date Priva Schweiz – Building Automation B usiness  
Position: Sales Manager Switzerland  
• Growth strategy: Business and revenue responsibility for solutions in Building 
Automation -, Smart Building - & Energy Management -Business, realignment of 
sales strategy from product - to service  oriented sales model, development of 
sales and engineering team Switzerland  
• Channel development: responsibility for expanding the channel, partner 
programmes, building sustainable business relationships and business 
networks in a very competitive market  
• Business Development: Change from pure partner business to pull/push 
strategy, build end customer relationships  
• Sales Manager: direct report of 1 pre -sales engineer, sales manager in Sept. 
2022  
• Customer relations: P roactively lead sales teams to develop new partners and 
projects, customer visits, budget plans defined, sales presentations, RFP / RFQ 
project selections and pre -sales activities.  
    
• Results achieved: Revenue increase 15% to approx. 2.5 million in the firs t year, 
2022 expansion of team and branch office achieved, first Smart Building project 
in Switzerland 200k.  
 
April 2009 to May 2019 Qognigy Schweiz – Software for Video Security  
 
Aug 2015 to Nay 2019  
Position: Regional Manager Switzerland – Italy / Managing Director Qognify 
Switzerland (formerly SeeTec (Schweiz) GmbH)  
• Growth Strategy: Driving Sales strategy, business - and revenue plans for  Video 
Surveillance products for Switzerland and Italy, in 2018 focused strategical 
activities in Italy, start -up local branch  
• Sales Manager: Direct reports 1 Sales and 1 Pre -Sales Engineer / Managing 
Director SeeTec (Schweiz) GmbH – since 24.11.2011  
• Channel Development: Leading initiatives trough channel creation, partner 
programs, building strong sales networks in an extremely competitive market, 
(developed pipeline in Italy within 1 year from € 120k to 1.2M)  
• Business Development: Led vertical chann el strategy by identifying new 
opportunities, new system integrators and end -users for the Industry, Logistics, 
Finance and Retail.  
• Client Relationship: Proactively leading sales team to develop partners & 
projects, including customer visits, capture pla ns, sales presentation, tender 
bids (RFP / RFQ requests) project selection and presales activities  
• Team Development: in 2018 recruited first Country Manager for Italy, managed 
start-up of new Italian branch, coaching and introducing new activities  
 
Sept 2014 to July 2015  
Position : Sales Manager Central Europe (D -A-CH, Netherlands, Italy)  / Director 
Qognify Switzerland (formerly SeeTec (Schweiz) GmbH)  
• Growth Strategy: Driving Sales strategy, business - and revenue plans for Video 
Surveillance in Central  Europe (D -A-CH, Netherland, Italy)  
• Sales Manager: Direct reports 8 Sales and 2 Pre -Sales, Managing Director 
SeeTec (Schweiz) GmbH  
• Channel Development: Leading initiatives trough channel creation, partner 
programs, building strong sales networks in an extremely competitive mark

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
